jcr:content.jcr:title: List of Chinese administrative divisions by area

contentheadline.headline: List of Chinese administrative divisions by area

contentrichtext.text: {{For|the administrative divisions governed by the [[Republic of China]] ([[Taiwan]])|List of Republic of China administrative divisions by area}} {{no footnotes|date=May 2012}} {{China divisions by}} This is a list of the first-level [[Administrative divisions of the People's Republic of China|administrative divisions]] of the '''[[People's Republic of China]]''' (PRC), including all provinces, autonomous regions, special administrative regions, and municipalities, in order of their total [[area]]. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Rank || Administrative Division || Area (km²) || Area (sq mi) || National Share (%) || Comparable Country |- | 1 || [[Xinjiang]] || 1,664,897 || 640,900 || 17.23 || {{IRN}} |- | 2 || [[Tibet Autonomous Region|Tibet]] || 1,228,400 || 474,300 || 12.75 || {{RSA}} |- | 3 || [[Nei Menggu]] || 1,155,092 || 456,800 ||12.28 || {{COL}} |- | 4 || [[Qinghai]] || 721,000 || 278,400 || 7.48 || {{ZMB}} |- | 5 || [[Sichuan]] || 485,000 || 187,300 || 5.03 || {{TKM}} |- | 6 || [[Heilongjiang]] || 452,645 || 177,600 || 4.77 || {{PNG}} |- | 7 || [[Gansu]] || 454,000 || 175,300 || 4.71 || {{SWE}} |- | 8 || 205,800 || 79,500 || 2.13 || {{BLR}} |- | 12 || [[Hebei]] || 188,434 || 72,500 || 1.94 || {{KGZ}} |- | 13 || [[Jilin]] || 191,124 || 72,400 || 1.94 || {{SEN}} |- | 14 || [[Hubei]] || 185,888 || 1.73 || {{SUR}} |- | 18 || [[Jiangxi]] || 166,894 || 64,400 ||1.73 || {{TUN}} |- | 19 || [[Shanxi]] || 156,711 || 60,540 ||1.62 || {{NEP}} |- | 20 || [[Shandong]] || 156,700 || 60,500 || 1.62 ||
